original_title: Jo Siffert: Live Fast - Die Young
overview: In 1971 50,000 people mourned in the streets of Fribourg, Switzerland: Jo "Seppi" Siffert had died in a crash at Brands Hatch (GB). Until today, Jo Siffert is considered to be one of the ten best racing drivers ever
tagline: A tribute to the Swiss racing legend
title: Jo Siffert: Live Fast - Die Young
